scripts.serve:node: node -e "const http=require('http'),fs=require('fs'),path=require('path');http.createServer((req,res)=>{const file=path.join(__dirname,req.url==='/'?'index.html':req.url);fs.readFile(file,(err,data)=>{if(err){res.writeHead(404);res.end('Not Found');return;}const ext=path.extname(file);const contentType={'html':'text/html','js':'application/javascript','css':'text/css','json':'application/json'}[ext.slice(1)]||'text/plain';res.writeHead(200,{'Content-Type':contentType});res.end(data);});}).listen(8000,()=>console.log('Server running at http://localhost:8000'));"
